testcase.name: Check that two users can successfully log into Amazon consecutively
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon homepage...............................................passed When I hover over 'Hello, Sign in' button...................................passed And I click on 'Sign in' button under Hello, Sign in........................passed And I enter a valid "shakir.jahangir83@gmail.com" on 'Email (phone for mobile accounts) field.passed And I click on 'Continue' button below 'Email (phone for mobile accounts) field.passed And I enter a valid "BugBusters" on the Password field......................passed And I click on 'Sign-in' button after password..............................passed Then I verify that "Shakir" is displayed....................................passed

testcase.name: Check that two users can successfully log into Amazon consecutively 2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon homepage...............................................passed When I hover over 'Hello, Sign in' button...................................passed And I click on 'Sign in' button under Hello, Sign in........................passed And I enter a valid "zarria@xhanimatedm.com" on 'Email (phone for mobile accounts) field.passed And I click on 'Continue' button below 'Email (phone for mobile accounts) field.passed And I enter a valid "BugBusters" on the Password field......................passed And I click on 'Sign-in' button after password..............................passed Then I verify that "Phong" is displayed.....................................passed
